briefTitle: Study on the Molecular Mechanism of Berberine to Improve Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Complicated With Depression
officialTitle: Study on the Molecular Mechanism of Berberine Regulating the Gut Microbiota-derived Metabolites 5-AVAB to Improve Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Complicated With Depression.

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

primary.description: There were no additional intervention measures in this study. Faeces were collected after excretion for in vitro drug intervention experiments. The blood collection volume (5 mL) met the ISO international standard and was used to detect the 5-AVAB content in each group.
